query: SELECT u.id, u.name, u.email, COUNT(r.id) as ride_count, COALESCE(SUM(r.distance), 0) as total_distance FROM users u LEFT JOIN ridingRecords r ON u.id = r.userId GROUP BY u.id ORDER BY total_distance DESC LIMIT 15;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user mJX9EQK12biUJGd.0c3e5cf8c922 --database XQsH52MNZAyXrU9qYq4MDw --execute SELECT u.id, u.name, u.email, COUNT(r.id) as ride_count, COALESCE(SUM(r.distance), 0) as total_distance FROM users u LEFT JOIN ridingRecords r ON u.id = r.userId GROUP BY u.id ORDER BY total_distance DESC LIMIT 15;
